```{r echo = FALSE}
finger.mini = readPNG("Fingerprint_mini.png") %>% inverted %>% grayscaled %>% binarized(function(x){x>0.4})

finger.mini %>% KMM %>% writePNG("Fingerprint_mini_thin_KMM.png")

finger.mini %>% K3M %>% writePNG("Fingerprint_mini_thin.png")
```
